divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking up in the air, taking in some oxygen on my deck, while all of a sudden I get caught on a star pattern. Its a triangle consisting of 3 stars, the bottom ufo falls away and takes off randomly. I thought it was a star at first, but when I saw it to move, I have no idea what it was. It just looked like a star floating in the air high in the sky, in space, and did not have streaks to it, all it did was move... I lost sight of it when it went off too far into space...
Summary: Looks like a star, stagnant, then flys north until it dissapperates in the sky
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Berkeley
There were no other sightings in Berkeley on or around August 9th 2005
